review: I had tried using 2 different Sony DVD players on different TVs to stream from Amazon prime.  One was connected directly to router and the other was Wi-Fi.  Both would stop and pause steaming and I would get messages that my internet was too slow.  Yet I could immediately go to the PC and steam the same content flawlessly.Got the Fire TV and connected directly to the router.  It performs flawlessly and instantly. Wired the HDMI cable to a input on my Sony STR-DH540 5.2 Channel Receiver and configured the Fire TV sound for Dolby with audio return. Fantastic!
